snippet: The release of a brand-new, high-profile gadget always prompts a geeky ritual: videotaping the opening of its package, or "unboxing." Unfortunately for Google, the ceremonial unboxing of its Nexus 7 tablet isn't going so smoothly on YouTube.
abstract: The release of a brand-new, high-profile gadget always prompts a geeky ritual: videotaping the opening of its package, or "unboxing." Unfortunately for Google, the ceremonial unboxing of its Nexus 7 tablet isn't going so smoothly on YouTube.

headline.main: Unboxing Google's Nexus 7 Is Harder Than Defeating Ninjas
